name.baseName: 褐煤生产;褐煤;褐煤生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The lignite production data set represents the use of lignite, also known as brown coal, in the steel manufacturing industry. Specifically, it pertains to the Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) process using lignite as a reductant. The data has applications in evaluating the environmental impact of using lignite in the Coal-Direct Reduction (Coal-DR) route in the production of steel. This route is an alternative process to the Coke Oven Gas-Direct Reduction (COG-DR) and Hydrogen-Direct Reduction (H-DR) routes, which are not yet scaled-up in China.

褐煤生产数据集代表了在钢铁制造行业中使用褐煤（又称棕煤）的情况。具体来说，它涉及使用褐煤作为还原剂的直接还原铁（DRI）过程。该数据在评估使用褐煤的Coal-Direct Reduction（Coal-DR）路线在钢铁生产中的环境影响时有应用。这种路线是Coke Oven Gas-Direct Reduction（COG-DR）和Hydrogen-Direct Reduction（H-DR）路线的替代过程，这两种路线在中国尚未大规模推广。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The LCI of Coal-DR is obtained, as shown in Table 9, based on the statistics of the demonstration project in China.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The lignite production data set represents the use of lignite, also known as brown coal, in the steel manufacturing industry. Specifically, it pertains to the Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) process using lignite as a reductant. The data has applications in evaluating the environmental impact of using lignite in the Coal-Direct Reduction (Coal-DR) route in the production of steel. This route is an alternative process to the Coke Oven Gas-Direct Reduction (COG-DR) and Hydrogen-Direct Reduction (H-DR) routes, which are not yet scaled-up in China.

褐煤生产数据集代表了在钢铁制造行业中使用褐煤（又称棕煤）的情况。具体来说，它涉及使用褐煤作为还原剂的直接还原铁（DRI）过程。该数据在评估使用褐煤的Coal-Direct Reduction（Coal-DR）路线在钢铁生产中的环境影响时有应用。这种路线是Coke Oven Gas-Direct Reduction（COG-DR）和Hydrogen-Direct Reduction（H-DR）路线的替代过程，这两种路线在中国尚未大规模推广。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this lignite production life cycle inventory (LCI) data set should note that it is based on statistics from a demonstration project in China, and supplemented with estimates from literature data including simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling specific to the Coal-Direct Reduction (Coal-DR) routes. The data set is not normalized to a global standard and may not be representative of larger scale operations or alternative geographical contexts. The methodology and scale limitations should be taken into consideration when utilizing this data for decision-making or comparative analysis with other processes.
使用该褐煤生产生命周期清单（LCI）数据集的用户应注意，该数据集基于中国示范项目的统计数据，并结合了包括模拟、实验室测试和针对Coal-Direct Reduction（Coal-DR）路线的过程模型在内的文献数据估算。该数据集未按全球标准规范化，可能不代表更大规模运作或其他地理环境。在使用该数据进行决策或与其他过程进行比较分析时，应考虑其方法论和规模限制。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
